title: LoL won't launch (MAC)
body: I own a mac (2007 with el captain). I played a game and then closed out of it. When i try to launch LoL it appears for 2 seconds on the dock then vanishes. I don't think its a computer issue because people with macs like me are having the same issue. Ive used the HRT and redowloaded about 5 times and nothing is working. please help riot!!

replies.body: We're still working on getting these [**issues with older Macs**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/2aNwwPQY-5232017-older-macs-unable-to-launch-league) ironed out, but you can check that sticky post for a few different things you can try. If none of those are helping, grab some logs using the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and shoot those over to our tech guys to help us figure out a solution!
